project_abstract.cdata: The Beilungang Thermal Power Project will comprise: (i) construction of a coal fired thermal power plant, including coal unloading facilities at Beilungang with two generating units of 600 megawatts (MW) each; (ii) construction of two single circuits of 500 kV transmission lines and two associated substations to interconnect with the East China power grid and Zhejiang Provincial Electric Power Bureau's (ZPEPB) existing transmision system; (iii) provision of consulting services for engineering, detailed design, procurement and construction management of the thermal power plant; (iv) a training program; and (v) a tariff study for the East China power grid.

P003457.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>北仑港火力发电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的内容包括：（1）在北仑港建设一座燃煤热电厂，包括卸煤设施和两台600兆瓦发电机组；（2）架设两条500千伏单回路输电线路，建设两座配套变电站，使所发电力接入华东电网和浙江省电力局的现有输电系统；（3）就发电厂工程、详细设计、采购和施工管理等方面提供咨询服务；（4）开展培训；（5）开展华东电网电价研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
